title: Download GitHub releases
description: This script takes a github repository (hard-coded for demo purposes), and downloads the last 3 GitHub releases of version 1.x. It showcases context propgation (via netcat, curl, and wget) and auto-injection into inner commands (via xargs and parallel). Netcat is used for an initial head request to configure pagination, curl to make the inidivdual API requests, and wget for the actual downloads.
